009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012
013import java.util.Arrays;
014
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
016import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.PntUtils;
017import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
018import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
019
020/**
021 * Implemented from the original paper:
022 * Kasa, I., A curve fitting procedure and its error analysis, IEEE Trans. Inst. Meas., 25, 8-14, 1976.
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 *
026 */
027public class CircleFitKasa extends CircleFitAlgebraic {
028
029        private final double[] q;       // p = (B,C,D) algebraic circle parameters
030        
031        public CircleFitKasa(Pnt2d[] points) {
032                this.q = fit(points);
033        }
034        
035        @Override
036        public double[] getParameters() {
037                return new double[] {1, q[0], q[1], q[2]};
038        }
039        
040        // WB's version: Original from Kasa's paper
041        public double[] fit(Pnt2d[] pts) {
042                final int n = pts.length;
043                if (n < 3) {
044                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("at least 3 points are required");
045                }
046
047                // calculate sums
048                double sx = 0, sy = 0; // sz = 0;
049                double sxy = 0, sxx = 0, syy = 0;
050                double sxxx = 0, syyy = 0;
051                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
052                        final double x = pts[i].getX();
053                        final double y = pts[i].getY();
054                        final double x2 = sqr(x);
055                        final double y2 = sqr(y);
056                        sx   += x;
057                        sy   += y;
058                        sxx  += x2;
059                        syy  += y2;
060                        sxy  += x * y;
061                        sxxx += x2 * x + x * y2;        // = x^3 + x * y^2
062                        syyy += x2 * y + y * y2;        // = y^3 + x^2 * y
063                }
064                
065                double sz = sxx + syy;
066                
067                double[][] M = {        // = E in the paper
068                                { 2 * sx,  2 * sy,  n},
069                                { 2 * sxx, 2 * sxy, sx},
070                                { 2 * sxy, 2 * syy, sy}};
071                
072                //IJ.log("D = " + Matrix.toString(D));
073            
074                double[] b = {sz, sxxx, syyy};   // RHS vector (= E in the paper)
075//              IJ.log("b = " + Matrix.toString(b));
076                
077                double[] q = Matrix.solve(M, b); // = Q in the paper, q = (B,C,D)
078//              IJ.log("s = " + Matrix.toString(q));
079                
080                double B = -2 * q[0];
081                double C = -2 * q[1];
082                double D = -q[2];
083                return new double[] {B, C, D};
084        }
085        
086        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
087

375        
376        public static void main(String[] args) {
377                
378                System.out.println("-------------- KASA orig (WB) -----------------------------");
379                {
380                        Pnt2d[] pnts = PntUtils.fromDoubleArray(PA);
381                        CircleFitKasa fit = new CircleFitKasa(pnts);
382                        double[] p = fit.getParameters();
383                        System.out.println("p = " + Arrays.toString(p));
384                        GeometricCircle circle = fit.getGeometricCircle();
385                        System.out.println("circle = " + circle);
386                }
387                
388                
389//              System.out.println("-------------- PRATT (SVD Doube) -----------------------------");

393//              }
